meanings.definition: A device for measuring fermentation rates.
meanings.sent1: The zymometers displayed the fermentation rates accurately.
meanings.sent2: The brewery used zymometers to track how fast the fermentation was happening.
meanings.sent3: The zymometers seemed to be having a party, measuring the bubbles in the fermentation tank.
meanings.sent4: The zymometers were like diligent detectives, uncovering the secrets of the fermentation process.
meanings.sent5: The zymometers hummed with activity, revealing the hidden dance of fermentation.

meanings.definition: A tool used to monitor the progress of fermentation processes.
meanings.sent1: The zymometers helped keep an eye on the fermentation progress.
meanings.sent2: Winemakers rely on zymometers to ensure the fermentation is on track.
meanings.sent3: The zymometers were like little guardians, watching over the bubbling fermentation.
meanings.sent4: In the brewery, the zymometers were the silent observers of the fermentation journey.
meanings.sent5: The zymometers whispered secrets of the fermentation process, guiding the brewers along the way.
